content.text:
# 2025–26 Los Angeles Kings season

The 2025–26 Los Angeles Kings season is their 59th season for the National Hockey League (NHL) franchise that was established on June 5, 1967.
This is the final season of longtime captain Anze Kopitar, who announced before the season that he would retire afterwards.
